rows.label: tlk43420145_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Such a great play...
So sad...but uplifting too.

rows.label: tlk43420145_01_msg0002
rows.name:
They've been performing the Heroic
Adventures of Adel ever since I was
a child, you know.

rows.label: tlk43420145_01_msg0003
rows.name:
It's amazing that we keep a tale from
500 years ago going like we do.
